root.description: AutoMate is a general-purpose Uniswap v4 hook to let users put up a bounty and subscribe to an automatic on-chain task execution service running by a network of keepers(a.k.a. the swappers). Keepers are incentivized to execute the task as closely to the scheduled execution time as possible in order to claim the maximum amount of bounty.
root.name: autoMate-contracts
